en.text:
I am a seasoned {{Java}} developer with [[over six 6 years]] of professional experience, specializing in backend development with a little foundation in frontend technologies. I have also worked extensively with Kotlin in production environments, contributing to robust and scalable systems.

This diverse technical background enables me to adapt seamlessly to a wide range of project requirements — from designing and implementing reliable APIs to optimizing system performance and supporting full-stack development initiatives.

I look forward to the opportunity to contribute my expertise and collaborate on impactful, forward-thinking [[solutions.]]

nl.text:
Ik ben een ervaren {{Java}}-ontwikkelaar met [[meer dan 6 jaar]] professionele ervaring, gespecialiseerd in backend-ontwikkeling met een beetje basiskennis van frontend-technologieën. Ik heb ook uitgebreid gewerkt met Kotlin in productieomgevingen, wat heeft bijgedragen aan robuuste en schaalbare systemen.

Deze diverse technische achtergrond stelt me in staat om me naadloos aan te passen aan een breed scala aan projectvereisten — van het ontwerpen en implementeren van betrouwbare API's tot het optimaliseren van systeemprestaties en het ondersteunen van full-stack ontwikkelingsinitiatieven.

Ik kijk ernaar uit om mijn expertise bij te dragen en samen te werken aan impactvolle, vooruitstrevende [[oplossingen.]]

en.title: CEO at [[SalesForce]]
en.text: Working with Mark was a truly [[transformative experience]]. His outstanding programming skills and collaborative spirit not only elevated the quality of our project but also brought a renewed sense of motivation and purpose to us.

es.title: CEO en [[SalesForce]]
es.text: Trabajar con Mark fue una [[experiencia transformadora]]. Su gran habilidad para programar y su espíritu colaborativo mejoraron el proyecto y nos devolvieron la motivación y el propósito.

fr.title: PDG de [[SalesForce]]
fr.text: Travailler avec Mark fut une [[expérience transformante]]. Ses compétences en programmation et son esprit d’équipe ont élevé le projet et ravivé notre motivation et notre but.

ko.title: 세일즈포스 CEO
ko.text: Mark와 함께한 시간은 [[변화의 경험]]이었습니다. 그의 뛰어난 프로그래밍 실력과 협업 정신은 프로젝트 품질을 높이고 우리에게 새로운 동기를 불어넣었습니다.

en.title: Lead Developer at [[GitHub]]
en.text: Having Mark on our team was an invaluable asset. His [[deep programming insights and mentorship]] not only elevated our projects but also empowered us to tackle every challenge with confidence and creativity.

es.title: Desarrollador Principal en [[GitHub]]
es.text: Tener a Mark fue un recurso invaluable. Sus [[profundos conocimientos y mentoría]] mejoraron nuestros proyectos y nos dieron confianza para afrontar cualquier desafío con creatividad.

fr.title: Développeur Principal chez [[GitHub]]
fr.text: La présence de Mark fut un atout inestimable. Ses [[connaissances en programmation et son mentorat]] ont renforcé nos projets et notre capacité à relever les défis avec assurance.

ko.title: [[GitHub]] 수석 개발자
ko.text: Mark는 소중한 자산이었습니다. 그의 [[깊은 프로그래밍 통찰력과 멘토링]]은 프로젝트를 향상시키고 도전을 자신감과 창의성으로 해결할 수 있게 해주었습니다.

en.title: Managing Director at [[Dingga]]
en.text: Collaborating with Mark was a true [[game changer]] for our entire development process. His [[deep technical expertise]], creative problem-solving, and proactive mindset were absolutely invaluable.

es.title: Directora General en [[Dingga]]
es.text: Colaborar con Mark fue un verdadero [[punto de inflexión]]. Su [[gran experiencia técnica]], creatividad y mentalidad proactiva fueron absolutamente invaluables para nuestro equipo.

fr.title: Directrice Générale chez [[Dingga]]
fr.text: Travailler avec Mark a été un vrai [[tournant]]. Son [[expertise technique approfondie]], sa créativité et sa proactivité ont été d’une valeur inestimable pour notre développement.

ko.title: 딩가 전무이사
ko.text: Mark와의 협업은 진정한 [[게임 체인저]]였습니다. 그의 [[깊이 있는 기술 전문성]], 창의적인 문제 해결력, 능동적인 태도는 매우 소중한 자산이었습니다.

en.title: Creative Director at [[Dribbble]]
en.text: Mark Choi's [[attention to detail]] and his [[innovative thinking]] brought a fresh perspective to our whole design process! Simply amazing!

es.title: Director Creativo en [[Dribbble]]
es.text: La [[atención al detalle]] y el [[pensamiento innovador]] de Mark Choi aportaron una perspectiva fresca a todo nuestro proceso de diseño. ¡Simplemente increíble!

fr.title: Directeur Créatif chez [[Dribbble]]
fr.text: L’[[attention aux détails]] et la [[pensée innovante]] de Mark Choi ont apporté une perspective nouvelle à tout notre processus de design ! Simplement incroyable !

ko.title: [[Dribbble]] 크리에이티브 디렉터
ko.text: 마크 최의 [[세심한 배려]]와 [[혁신적인 사고]]가 전체 디자인 과정에 신선한 시각을 가져왔습니다! 정말 놀랍습니다!

en.title: {{Software}} Development
en.text: Building robust and scalable application systems using Java, Kotlin, and Spring Boot.

nl.title: {{Software}} Ontwikkeling
nl.text: Robuuste en schaalbare application-systemen bouwen met Java, Kotlin en Spring Boot.

en.title: Code{{ Refactoring & Review}}
en.text: Ensuring code quality thorough refactoring and review processes.

nl.title: Code{{Refactoring & Review}}
nl.text: Zorgen voor codekwaliteit door middel van refactoring en reviewprocessen.

en.title: {{Team Collaboration}}
en.text: Fostering effective team collaboration and communication to achieve project goals.

nl.title: {{Team Samenwerking}}
nl.text: Effectieve team samenwerking en communicatie bevorderen om projectdoelen te bereiken.

en.title: {{Agile}} Methodologies
en.text: Implementing Agile methodologies to enhance project efficiency and adaptability.

nl.title: {{Agile}} Methodologieën
nl.text: Agile methodologieën implementeren om projectefficiëntie en aanpassingsvermogen te verbeteren.

en.title: {{Problem Solving}}
en.text: Applying creative problem-solving techniques to overcome technical challenges.

nl.title: {{Probleemoplossing}}
nl.text: Creatieve probleemoplossingstechnieken toepassen om technische uitdagingen te overwinnen.

en.title: {{Mentorship}} & Training
en.text: Providing mentorship and training to junior developers to foster their growth.

nl.title: {{Mentorschap}} & Training
nl.text: Mentorschap en training bieden aan junior ontwikkelaars om hun groei te bevorderen.
